title: I'm Doing Wifey Things Without A Ring
itunes:title: I'm Doing Wifey Things Without A Ring
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my boyfriend and I have been dating for three years and we moved in together with a plan to get married and start a family. I'm 30 years old and he is 25. After a year and a half of living together, he bought me an engagement ring and I found out because he was dropping hints about it. Then one day in November, he admitted to me that he had bought the ring but he’s not as happy in this relationship as he should be. He told me that he was having doubts about marrying me. I asked him what made him feel that way..............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my boyfriend and I have been dating for three years and we moved in together with a plan to get married and start a family. I'm 30 years old and he is 25. After a year and a half of living together, he bought me an engagement ring and I found out because he was dropping hints about it. Then one day in November, he admitted to me that he had bought the ring but he’s not as happy in this relationship as he should be. He told me that he was having doubts about marrying me. I asked him what made him feel that way..............
